alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Citrus, southwestern Sumter, Pasco and Hernando Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dade City to near Lutz. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Dade City, Hudson, Lutz, St. Leo, Weeki Wachee, New Port Richey East, South Brooksville, North Brooksville, Land O Lakes, Hernando County Airport, Wesley Chapel South, Timber Pines, Hill n Dale, Jasmine Estates, Weeki Wachee Gardens and Pine Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter
